    Experience



    Interests

    Jan 2018 – present: PhD Student Karolinska University Hospital · Cancer Center Karolinska (CCK) · Martin Enge Lab · Stockholm · Sweden

    Focus on single cell RNA sequencing method development.

    May 2014 – Dec 2017: PhD Student Karolinska University Hospital · Cancer Center Karolinska (CCK) · Dan Grander Lab · Stockholm · Sweden

    Focus on the role of lncRNAs in cancer.

    Jun 2012 – Jun 2014: Research Assistant Karolinska University Hospital · Cancer Center Karolinska (CCK) · Dan Grander Lab · Stockholm · Sweden

    Focus on the role of lncRNAs in cancer.

    Jun 2012 – Jun 2014: Research Assistant Karolinska Institutet · Department of Laboratory Medicine · Edvard Smith Lab · Stockholm · Sweden

    Focus on induced pluripotent stem cells for use in disease modeling and regenerative medicine.
